author: Scavenius, Laurentius Martini
title: De fidei salvificæ principio ac fundamento in Christo Jesu theses theologicæ, in publicam disputationem in Academia Hafniensi ad d. 14. & 17. Decemb. volente Deo propositæ quarum veritatem defendent ... pro laurea doctorali in s.s. theologia impetranda, A
